title: China today. No. 8206
creator_credit: Central Newsreel and Documentary Film Studio of the People's Republic of China
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Shows a glimpse of China’s many novel arts and crafts including the Cishou Kilns where much of China’s pottery is made; cork pictures; hair embroidery; root sculpture; stone pictures.
